sections.title: SECTION 1: WHAT IS A CELL? (FOUNDATIONS)
sections.summary: Learn what cells are, what they do to stay alive, and why cell size, DNA, and division matter for understanding cancer.

subsections.title: 1.1 What Is a Cell and Why It Matters
subsections.description: Define what a cell is, what cells must do to stay alive, and how cell teamwork supports the whole organism.
